input_args.passage: 'Old-earth or young-earth belief | CMI takes the stand that the creation is thousands of years old, based on straightforward acceptance of the chronology in Genesis.'
input_args.claim: 'From the first source, we understand that organizations like Answers in Genesis, which shares beliefs with Creation Ministries International, see anything other than the young Earth view as a compromise on the principle of biblical inerrancy.'
